welcome.title: Welcome üëã
welcome.body: You just created an account in a calm, ethical space. A few quick things ‚Äî then you're in.

account.title: One Account. Simple.
bullets: No re-signing in all the time

karma.title: Karma = Trust & Growth
karma.body: Oxy Karma is a points system that reacts to what you do. Helpful, respectful, constructive actions earn it. Harmful or low‚Äëeffort stuff chips it away. More karma can unlock benefits; low karma can limit features. It keeps things fair and rewards real contribution.

avatar.title: Make It Yours
avatar.body: Add an avatar so people recognize you. It will show anywhere you show up here. Skip if you want ‚Äî you can add it later.

ready.title: You're Ready
ready.body: Explore. Contribute. Earn karma. Stay in control.

profile.noBio: This user has no bio yet.

type.title: What type of feedback?

summary.title: Summary
summary.subtitle: Please review your feedback before submitting

success.message: Your feedback has been submitted successfully. We'll review it and get back to you soon.

toasts.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields

recover.title: Recover Account
recover.enterCode: Enter the 6‚Äëdigit code from your authenticator app.
recover.resetSuccess: Your password has been reset! You can now sign in.
recover.noEmail: We no longer send recovery emails. Please use your recovery phrase to restore your identity. Contact support if you need assistance.

password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

recover.whatsNextBody: You can now reset your password or return to sign in with your existing credentials.
recover.completeSecure: Your account recovery is complete and secure.

toasts.switchFailed: There was a problem switching accounts. Please try again.

empty.title: No saved accounts

what.a: Karma is a recognition of your positive actions in the Oxy Ecosystem. It cannot be sent or received directly.

earn.a: By helping others, reporting bugs, contributing content, and participating in community events.

lose.a: Karma may be reduced for negative actions or breaking community rules.

use.q: What can I do with karma?
use.a: Unlock rewards, badges, and special features as you earn more karma.

transfer.q: Can I transfer karma to others?
transfer.a: No, karma cannot be sent or received. It is only earned by your actions.

support.a: Contact Oxy support via the app or website for any karma-related questions.

rewards.title: Karma Rewards
rewards.subtitle: Unlock special features and recognition
rewards.intro: Unlock special features and recognition by earning karma!

earlyAccess.title: üéâ Early Access
earlyAccess.desc: Get early access to new features with 100+ karma.

badge.title: üèÖ Community Badge
badge.desc: Earn a special badge for 500+ karma.

featured.title: üåü Featured Member
featured.desc: Be featured in the community for 1000+ karma.

center.info: Karma can only be earned by positive actions in the Oxy Ecosystem. It cannot be sent or received directly.

about.title: About Karma
about.subtitle: Learn about the karma system
about.intro: Karma is a recognition of your positive actions in the Oxy Ecosystem. It cannot be sent or received directly, only earned by contributing to the community.

why.title: Why Karma?
why.text: Karma unlocks special features and recognition in the Oxy Ecosystem. The more you contribute, the more you earn!

accountVerification.title: Account Verification
accountVerification.description: Request a verified badge for your account. Verified accounts help establish authenticity and credibility.
accountVerification.reasonPlaceholder: Explain why you need a verified badge (e.g., public figure, brand, organization)
accountVerification.reasonRequired: Please provide a reason for verification
accountVerification.evidencePlaceholder: Provide any supporting documentation or links (e.g., official website, social media profiles)
accountVerification.successMessage: Your verification request has been submitted. Request ID: {{requestId}}
accountVerification.note: Note: Verification requests are reviewed manually and may take several days. We will notify you once your request has been reviewed.
